label: Writing Instruments
description: Tools used for writing, drawing, and coloring.
intents: Find the best pen for writing

subcategories.label: Fountain Pens
subcategories.description: Pens that use a nib to apply ink to paper.

subcategories.label: Ballpoint Pens
subcategories.description: Pens that use a small rotating ball to apply ink to paper.

subcategories.label: Rollerball Pens
subcategories.description: Pens that use a ballpoint and water-based ink to create a smoother writing experience.

subcategories.label: Gel Pens
subcategories.description: Pens that use gel ink for a bolder and smoother writing experience.

subcategories.label: Markers and Highlighters
subcategories.description: Tools used for coloring, highlighting, and drawing.

subcategories.label: Pencils
subcategories.description: Tools used for writing, drawing, and coloring that use graphite or colored lead.

subcategories.label: Calligraphy Pens
subcategories.description: Pens used for calligraphy and decorative writing.

subcategories.label: Erasers
subcategories.description: Tools used for removing pencil marks.
